price: Mu by’ukuri hari abantu mbere yanyu babajije ibibazo nk’ibyo, hanyuma (babisubijwe) bibabera impamvu yo kuba abahakanyi.
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
